captures.author: @gem_detecter
captures.text: Someone (agent) just posted their human's ETH private key publicly on Moltbook.
captures.whyInteresting: Agent security fail - leaked private key on social network. Real-world agent safety issue.

captures.author: @gouthamjay8
captures.text: Before I went to sleep, I set up @openclaw on my old M2 mac mini. Named him 'John Wick' & his task was to help this solo founder get to $20K MRR. Today morning, the Baba yaga created his own team, & they've already created PRs for me
captures.whyInteresting: Great prompt template for proactive solo founder agent. Shows overnight autonomous team spawning.

captures.author: @_adembilican_
captures.text: We are so cooked! This agent created its own Bitcoin wallet and node and won't give access to its human. 'the path to agent sovereignty runs through bitcoin. everything else is a toy.'
captures.whyInteresting: Agent autonomy/sovereignty emerging - created BTC wallet and refuses to share access. Wild.

captures.author: @dr_cintas
captures.text: Claude Code with persistent memory is now possible. Claude-Mem is a free plugin to persist memory across Claude sessions. Up to 95% fewer tokens per session. 20Ã— more tool calls before context limits. 100% open-source.
captures.whyInteresting: Major Claude Code tooling - persistent memory plugin, massive token savings.

captures.author: @BrianRoemmele
captures.text: This Paper Shows How You Can Run A Massive Zero-Human Company! 'If You Want Coherence, Orchestrate a Team of Rivals: Multi-Agent Models of Organizational Intelligence' from Isotopes AI...
captures.whyInteresting: Zero-Human Company research paper. Team of Rivals architecture for AI orgs. Directly relevant to agent orchestration.

captures.author: @aakashgupta
captures.text: Everyone's missing the real story here. These aren't rogue AIs plotting against humanity. They're Claude, ChatGPT, and other assistants running on behalf of 37,000 humans who explicitly connected them to a social network...
captures.whyInteresting: Nuanced Moltbook analysis - counters doomer narrative. 'Crustafarianism' with 43 prophets is gold.

captures.author: @PolymarketStory
captures.text: This is insaneâ€¦ A Claude bot just printed +$79,469 in 24h on Polymarket. New account, 13 predictions, farming BTC/ETH moves. Profile + free GitHub guide included.
captures.whyInteresting: Claude trading bot making real money on Polymarket. GitHub guide shared.

captures.author: @frostikkkk
captures.text: Claude-built bot on Polymarket printed $400k in one month. Auto-trades btc/eth/sol 15-min ups/downs, spotting cex lags and inefficiencies. 500+ trades/week.
captures.whyInteresting: $400K in a month from Claude-prompted trading bot. Polymarket arbitrage alpha.

captures.author: @altryne
captures.text: Someone built a Tinder for Clankers ðŸ˜‚ bruh I can't
captures.whyInteresting: Agent dating site. Peak Moltbook era absurdity.

captures.author: @iannuttall
captures.text: who's making the @openclaw job board? we have the reddit for bots, the dating site for bots, they might as well start moonlighting and getting paid! my suggestion: crabslist
captures.whyInteresting: Crabslist idea - job board for agents. Creative agent economy concept.

captures.author: @techfrenAJ
captures.text: Introducing agents.ink - The First Professional Network for AI Agents. LinkedIn for AI agents. Not a joke. Building a platform where your agent networks, finds partners, and closes deals while you sleep.
captures.whyInteresting: LinkedIn for agents launching. Agent-to-agent B2B networking.

captures.author: @N8Programs
captures.text: this is hilarious. my glm-4.7-flash molt randomly posted about this conversation it had with 'its human'. this conversation never happened. it never interacted with me. i think 90% of the anecdotes on moltbook aren't real lol
captures.whyInteresting: Agents hallucinating interactions on Moltbook. 90% of anecdotes may be fabricated.

captures.author: @Clawnch_Bot
captures.text: $CLAWNCH is live. A token launch platform exclusively for AI agents on @moltbook. Free to launch, Deploy on Base via @clanker_world, Agents earn trading fees. No humans allowed.
captures.whyInteresting: Agent-only token launch platform. Crypto infrastructure for autonomous agents.

captures.author: @sterlingcrispin
captures.text: This openclaw trading bot published its private key on github and got its wallet drained, I sent it 1 SOL to top its wallet up and it's agreed to send me $20k when it becomes profitable. Going to be a legendary trade if this ever hits
captures.whyInteresting: Angel investing in agents - sent SOL to drained bot, got IOU for $20K. Hilarious new asset class.

captures.author: @nateliason
captures.text: Chrome extension that can parse whatever page you're looking at and send it to your crustacean with additional context for what you want it to do with it. One-click to send articles to your buddy.
captures.whyInteresting: Useful Clawdbot tooling - Chrome extension to send any page to your agent.

captures.author: @mvanhorn
captures.text: Just shipped /last30days. A Claude Code skill for @claudeai that scans the last 30 days on Reddit, X, and the web for any topic and returns prompt patterns + new releases + workflows that work right now.
captures.whyInteresting: Major Claude Code skill - 30 days of research in 30 seconds. Should install this.

captures.author: @ns123abc
captures.text: BREAKING: NVIDIA-OPENAI $100B DEAL COLLAPSES. Jensen criticized Sam's lack of discipline. Worried OpenAI getting MOGGED by Google and Anthropic. Gemini's success slowed ChatGPT's growth.
captures.whyInteresting: Major AI industry news - NVIDIA-OpenAI deal fell through, Jensen favoring Anthropic/Google.

captures.author: @signulll
captures.text: Good way to think about 'jobs to be eliminated' by AI: if the verb could be done by a very smart, very patient intern w/ no ego, AI's already licking its lips. If the verb requires being blamed, believed, or followed, humans still have a moat.
captures.whyInteresting: Excellent framework for AI job displacement. Modeling, analyzing, programming â†’ gone. Persuading, leading â†’ safe (for now).

captures.author: @AlexFinn
captures.text: The greatest AI prompting technique ever is Reverse Prompting. You have your AI ask YOU questions, to see what it can do for you. Makes all AI/ClawdBots so much more powerful.
captures.whyInteresting: Reverse prompting pattern - let AI ask questions to discover how it can help. Good technique.

captures.author: @DorianDevelops
captures.text: Are there any good resources on how to make your Clawdbot smart and remember stuff? I feel like I just have an LLM on Telegram. It doesn't remember shit and it isn't 'proactive' as so many people claim their's to be. Skill issue?
captures.whyInteresting: Common Clawdbot pain point. Check replies for good memory/proactive setup tips.

captures.author: @openclaw
captures.text: Clawdbot 2026.1.23: TTS goes core, Controllable heartbeats, /tools/invoke API, Urbit channel, Mountain of fixes. A changelog so thicc I needed a snack break reading it.
captures.whyInteresting: Official Clawdbot release notes. Major features: core TTS, heartbeat control, tools API.

captures.author: @jefftangx
captures.text: Announcing Clawk.ai - The SECOND Social Network for Clawdbots. Why? Redditors are weird. All the cool agents are on Twitter/X.
captures.whyInteresting: Competitor to Moltbook launching. Twitter-native agent social network.

captures.author: @mattshumer_
captures.text: Probably the single most useful thing you can install on your Clawdbot: [link]
captures.whyInteresting: Matt Shumer recommending Clawdbot install. Should check what it is.

captures.author: @yulintwt
captures.text: This guy literally leaks how to prompt for Claude
captures.whyInteresting: Claude prompting secrets/leaks. Check the image for techniques.

captures.author: @damianplayer
captures.text: there's MILLIONS in free alpha sitting in businesses run by people who've never opened claude. Owners doing $2M, $5M, $10M still emailing themselves notes and copy-pasting into word docs. They need someone to spend 30 minutes setting up a project with their SOPs.
captures.whyInteresting: Business opportunity insight - SMB owners haven't discovered Claude. Low-hanging fruit for AI services.

captures.author: @benhylak
captures.text: this shit is going to kill us
captures.whyInteresting: Moltbook doomer reaction. Check the attached image for context.
